鵊字的基本解释

鵊
jiá
杜鹃鸟。
姓。

鵊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiá］
［《廣韻》古洽切，入洽，見。］
见“鵯鵊”。

鵊字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵊； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1489第17
【廣韻】古洽切【集韻】【韻會】訖洽切，?音夾。【廣韻】杜鵑也。又鵯鵊。【正字通】歐陽修鵯鵊詩：龍樓鳳閣鬰崢嶸，深宮不聞更漏聲。紅紗蠟燭愁夜短，綠窻鵯鵊催天明。【註】鵯鵊，催明鳥，京師謂之夏雞。又姓。鵊治，黃帝臣。【前漢·藝文志】隂陽家有鵊治子一篇。又【集韻】檄頰切，音協。鳥名。

鵊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鵊字的起名意思

暂无。

["Guangyun" Ancient Qiaqi, enter Qia, see you. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鵊; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1489 Page 17
[Guang Yun] Ancient Qiaqie [Jiyun] [Rhyme Meeting] Qiaqie, sound clip. [Guang Yun] Cuckoo also. Buzzard again. [Zhengzitong] Poem by Ouyang Xiu Buzzard: Longlou and Fengge are full of grandeur, and the deep palace does not hear it even more. The red gauze candle has a short sad night, and the green buzzard reminds the day. [Note] Bulbul, reminding the bird, the Beijing master called the summer chicken. Another surname. Lu Zhi, Huang Dichen. [Previous Han·Arts and Literature] There is an article by the yin and yang family. Also 【Jiyun】Cut cheeks, music association. The name of the bird.
